SEARCH
Package com.influxdb.client.internal.flowable

Class BackpressureBatchesBufferStrategy

java.lang.Object
com.influxdb.client.internal.flowable.BackpressureBatchesBufferStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.FlowableOperator<AbstractWriteClient.BatchWriteItem,AbstractWriteClient.BatchWriteItem>
public final class BackpressureBatchesBufferStrategy extends Object implements io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.FlowableOperator<AbstractWriteClient.BatchWriteItem,AbstractWriteClient.BatchWriteItem>
The backpressure strategy which uses total sum of AbstractWriteClient.BatchWriteItem.length() to determine backpressure boundary.

The original strategy FlowableOnBackpressureBufferStrategy uses only count of elements.

See Also:
